subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City ended Everton’s unbeaten run in England’s Premier League this season with a 3-1 win on Saturday as Álvaro Negredo and Sergio Agüero scored goals.
snippet: Manchester City ended Everton’s unbeaten run in England’s Premier League this season with a 3-1 win on Saturday as Álvaro Negredo and Sergio Agüero scored goals.
